author: davirasm
title: Perfect LEGO gift
review:
I bought this cube for myself to see if the box would be good for carrying minifigs to photograph when I'm out and just want to bring a few. And yes, it's sturdy enough. Excellent!

I could also confirm that the build experience is nice enough to make this a perfect mini gift for my nieces and nephews.

On the downside: Price is a bit high. SEK 129 could have been 109 considering short build, only one minidoll, and collectors will need to get multiple for the blind bag animals.
